source_sentence: 誦呪者至此句稱弟子某。

source_sentence: ○南無薩怛他蘇伽哆耶阿羅訶帝三藐三菩陀寫(一)乃至跢姪他(四百十九)唵(四百二十)阿那隷(四百二十一)毗舍提(四百二十二)鞞囉跋闍囉陀唎(四百二十三)槃陀槃陀你(四百二十四)跋闍囉謗尼泮(四百二十五)虎[合*牛]都嚧甕泮(四百二十六)莎婆訶(四百二十七)。
translation: Namu sathātasugataya arhatti samyak-saṃbodhisattva (1) and even (419) Om (420) Anāthapiṇḍada (421) Viśāti (422) Vairocana-vajradhāra (423) Pāṇḍapanthaka (424) Vajrapāṇipam (425) Hu [hap*niu] tuolu-pam (426) Svāhā (427).
[Commentary] This dhāraṇī contains four hundred and twenty-seven phrases.
The preceding phrases are simply a statement of reverence for the buddhas and bodhisattvas.
They're simply to pay homage to the buddhas and bodhisattvas.
They are for the conversion of buddhas, bodhisattvas, sages, and so forth.
